---
title: How to Report a Bug
---

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: Reporting a bug for React Native is one of the best way to start contributing to the project. We use [GitHub issues](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues) as the main channel for handling new bug reports.

translations.zh-hant: 回報 React Native 的錯誤是開始貢獻專案的最佳方式之一。我們使用 [GitHub issues](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues) 作為處理新錯誤回報的主要管道。

segments.source_content: Before opening a new bug, please [search if the bug already exists](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues?q=sort%3Aupdated-desc%20is%3Aissue) in our issue tracker. Most of the time, that's the fastest way to find a response as someone else already experienced the same problem.

translations.zh-hant: 在開啟新錯誤報告前，請先[搜尋是否已有相同錯誤](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues?q=sort%3Aupdated-desc%20is%3Aissue)存在於我們的問題追蹤系統中。大多數情況下，這是最快找到解決方案的方式，因為可能已有其他人遇到相同問題。

segments.source_content: If you can't find your bug in the issue tracker, you can open a new one. Once you create a new issue, make sure you:

translations.zh-hant: 若在問題追蹤系統中找不到您的錯誤，您可以開啟新的報告。建立新問題時，請確保您：

segments.source_content:
- Add a description of the problem.
- Follow the instructions on the [issue template](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/new?template=bug_report.yml).
- Add the React Native version you're using.
- Add the output of the `npx @react-native-community/cli info` command.
- Add screenshots and videos of the problem if applicable.

translations.zh-hant:
- 添加問題描述。
- 遵循[問題模板](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/new?template=bug_report.yml)中的指示。
- 添加您使用的 React Native 版本。
- 添加 `npx @react-native-community/cli info` 指令的輸出結果。
- 若適用，添加問題的螢幕截圖和影片。

segments.source_content: All the bug reports should also include a **reproducer**: the code necessary for us to understand what is going on and help us with the debugging.

translations.zh-hant: 所有錯誤報告都應包含**重現步驟**：這是幫助我們理解問題並進行除錯的必要程式碼。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

Due to high number of issues we receive, reproducers are **mandatory**. Issues without reproducer cannot be investigated and will most likely be closed.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

由於我們收到大量問題報告，重現步驟是**強制要求**。未提供重現步驟的問題將無法被調查，且很可能會被關閉。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Providing a Reproducers

translations.zh-hant: ## 提供重現步驟

segments.source_content: The goal of a reproducer is to provide a way to _reproduce_ your bug. Without a reproducer, we won't be able to understand the bug, and we also won't be able to fix it.

translations.zh-hant: The goal of a reproducer is to provide a way to _reproduce_ your bug. Without a reproducer, we won't be able to understand the bug, and we also won't be able to fix it.

segments.source_content:
The reproducer should be **minimal**: having as little dependencies as possible (ideally none other than `react-native`) as this will help us better isolate the bug.
When someone on GitHub is asking for a reproducer, they're **not** asking for all of your source code.

translations.zh-hant:
重現步驟應盡量**精簡**：依賴項越少越好（理想情況下僅需 `react-native`），這有助於我們更好地隔離錯誤。
當 GitHub 上有人要求提供重現步驟時，他們**並非**要求您提供所有原始碼。

segments.source_content: You need instead to create a **minimal** project that reproduces the same crash/bug/issue you're reporting.

translations.zh-hant: 您需要建立一個能重現相同崩潰/錯誤/問題的**最小化**專案。

segments.source_content: This process is crucial, as often issues are actually solved by creating a reproducer. By creating a reproducer, it will be easier to understand if the issue is related to your specific setup or if it's actually a bug inside React Native.

translations.zh-hant: 這個過程至關重要，因為通常問題會在建立重現步驟的過程中被解決。透過建立重現步驟，將更容易判斷問題是與您的特定設定相關，還是確實為 React Native 內部的錯誤。

segments.source_content: Due to the amount of traffic we have on React Native, we can accept only one of those as a valid reproducer:

translations.zh-hant: 由於 React Native 的流量龐大，我們僅接受以下其中一種作為有效的重現步驟：

segments.source_content:
1. For majority of bugs: send us a Pull Request with the [RNTesterPlayground.js](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/blob/main/packages/rn-tester/js/examples/Playground/RNTesterPlayground.js) edited to reproduce your bug.
2. If your bug is UI related: a [Snack](https://snack.expo.dev).
3. If your bug is build/upgrade related: a project using our [Reproducer Template](https://github.com/react-native-community/reproducer-react-native/generate).

translations.zh-hant:
1. 對於大多數錯誤：提交 Pull Request 修改 [RNTesterPlayground.js](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/blob/main/packages/rn-tester/js/examples/Playground/RNTesterPlayground.js) 以重現您的錯誤。
2. 若您的錯誤與 UI 相關：提供一個 [Snack](https://snack.expo.dev)。
3. 若您的錯誤與建置/升級相關：使用我們的[重現模板](https://github.com/react-native-community/reproducer-react-native/generate)建立專案。

segments.source_content: ### RNTesterPlayground.js

translations.zh-hant: ### RNTesterPlayground.js

segments.source_content: The best way for you to provide a reproducer is to open a Pull Request against React Native that edits the [`RNTesterPlayground.js`](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/blob/main/packages/rn-tester/js/examples/Playground/RNTesterPlayground.js) file.

translations.zh-hant: 提供重現步驟的最佳方式是針對 React Native 提交 Pull Request 來修改 [`RNTesterPlayground.js`](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/blob/main/packages/rn-tester/js/examples/Playground/RNTesterPlayground.js) 檔案。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

This reproducer will run your code against `main` of `react-native` and is the **fastest** way we have to investigate and fix your bugs.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

This reproducer will run your code against `main` of `react-native` and is the **fastest** way we have to investigate and fix your bugs.

:::

segments.source_content: The `RNTesterPlayground.js` file is located inside the RN-Tester application, our reference App. You can read more about it how it works and how to build it inside its [dedicated README file](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/blob/main/packages/rn-tester/README.md).

translations.zh-hant: The `RNTesterPlayground.js` file is located inside the RN-Tester application, our reference App. You can read more about it how it works and how to build it inside its [dedicated README file](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/blob/main/packages/rn-tester/README.md).

segments.source_content: An example of such type of reproducer is here: [Reproduce modal layout issues #50704](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/50704/).

translations.zh-hant: 此類重現步驟的範例可參考：[Reproduce modal layout issues #50704](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/50704/)。

segments.source_content: Once you edit the `RNTesterPlayground.js`, you'll be able to see your code running inside the **Playground** Tab of RNTester:

translations.zh-hant: 編輯完 `RNTesterPlayground.js` 後，您將能在 RNTester 的 **Playground** 分頁中看到程式碼執行結果：

segments.source_content: ![Step one](/docs/assets/RNTesterPlayground.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![第一步](/docs/assets/RNTesterPlayground.png)

segments.source_content: ### Expo Snack

translations.zh-hant: ### Expo Snack

segments.source_content: For most UI related bugs, you reproduce them using an [Expo Snack](https://snack.expo.dev/).

translations.zh-hant: 對於大多數 UI 相關的錯誤，您可以使用 [Expo Snack](https://snack.expo.dev/) 來重現問題。

segments.source_content: With Expo Snack, you can run React Native code in your browser, and see it rendering right away.

translations.zh-hant: 透過 Expo Snack，您能在瀏覽器中直接執行 React Native 程式碼，並立即查看渲染結果。

segments.source_content: Once you are able to reproduce your issue in an Expo Snack, click the **Save** button to get a shareble link to attach to your issue report

translations.zh-hant: 當您成功在 Expo Snack 重現問題後，點擊 **Save** 按鈕取得可分享的連結，並附加至問題報告中。

segments.source_content: ### Reproducer Template

translations.zh-hant: ### 重現模板

segments.source_content: For most build-related bugs instead, you should reproduce them using the [community reproducer template](https://github.com/react-native-community/reproducer-react-native).

translations.zh-hant: 對於大多數建置相關的錯誤，您應使用 [社群提供的重現模板](https://github.com/react-native-community/reproducer-react-native) 來重現問題。

segments.source_content: This template creates a small project that runs with the React Native Community CLI and that can be used to showcase build issues.

translations.zh-hant: 此模板會建立一個基於 React Native Community CLI 的小型專案，專門用於展示建置問題。

segments.source_content: The template also comes with its own CI already set up with GitHub Actions, as this will help spotting any build issues you might be having.

translations.zh-hant: 該模板已預設整合 GitHub Actions 的 CI 流程，有助於快速發現潛在的建置問題。

segments.source_content: To use this template:

translations.zh-hant: 使用此模板的步驟：

segments.source_content:
1. Click the [Use this template](https://github.com/new?template_name=reproducer-react-native&template_owner=react-native-community) button on GitHub to create a new project starting from the template.
2. Clone your newly created repository locally.
3. Apply the modifications to reproduce your issue.
4. Attach your repository link to the new bug report you're creating.

translations.zh-hant:
1. 點擊 GitHub 上的 [Use this template](https://github.com/new?template_name=reproducer-react-native&template_owner=react-native-community) 按鈕，以此模板建立新專案。
2. 將新建的儲存庫克隆至本地端。
3. 進行修改以重現您的問題。
4. 將儲存庫連結附加至新建的問題報告中。
